response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is valued at $1,200,000 to us, reflecting its unique features, unparalleled craftsmanship, and potential long-term benefits. We believe it could be an invaluable asset for you, tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Considering its immense value, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at the same price of $1,200,000. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 1200000}
